column4: Sport;Phnom Penh: After a crackdown on drug use in a Phnom Penh nightclub
column5: police arrested dozens of men and women
column6: including a soccer player from Cambodian League side
column7: Boeung Ket FC. Midfielder ------Math Yamin------ was taken away by police from the ------Fly Club------ just after midnight on February 9
column13: Boeung Ket FC officially announced the termination of their contract with the player.------TVFB
